'''''The Professor's Bookshelf''''' is a collection of publications by the ''Leaves of Gold Press'' company. Their aim is to publish classic literary titles known to be enjoyed by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], by authors who were the forefathers of modern fantasy fiction, and [[J.R.R. Tolkien's inspirations|inspired]] Tolkien's works. There is the aim to include original illustrations by Tolkien's contemporary artists whom he admired.

Fantasy author Cecilia Dart-Thornton signs the introduction of each book.
